content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® f978 d e s i g n s t u d i o f r e e w i t h y a r n p u r c h a s e hot cakes mitered square baby blanket materials hot cakes 2 - 200g cakes plus 1 - 100g ball of encore worsted shown in hot cakes color 11 sugar plum + encore worsted color 702 size approx 32 x 32 needles 24 circulars size 7 & 8 needles 24 circulars gauge 16 sts = 4 in garter stitch on size us 8 or size necessary to obtain given gauge always pick up sts with right side of work facing you mitered square with size 8 needle loosely cast on 49 sts row 1 ws knit across row 2 rs sl 1 k22 k3tog k23 row 3 sl 1 knit to end row 4 sl 1 k21 k3tog k22 row 5 sl 1 knit to end row 6 sl 1 k20 k3tog k21 continue as established decreasing in the center of the row on every other row until there are 3 sts remaining next row k3tog cut yarn leaving a 6 tail for weaving in later abbreviations k = knit k2tog = knit two together p = purl rs= right side st s = stitch es ws = wrong side yo = yarn over p l y m o u t h y a r n® f978 d e s i g n s t u d i o f r e e w i t h y a r n p u r c h a s e begin 1 work a mitered square using hot cakes this is square 1 on diagram 2 for the next square cast on 25 sts then pick up and knit 24 sts along the top edge of previous square 49 sts on needle work a mitered square this is square 2 on diagram 3 after the 2nd square is complete pick up and knit 24 sts along the left hand edge of square 1 then cast on 25 sts 49 sts on needle work a mitered square this is square 3 on diagram you have now made squares 1-3 continue as established referring to the diagram for which square to work next for squares 5 8 9 12 13 14 17 18 21 and 25 you will be picking up 24 sts along the left hand edge of one square and 25 sts along the top edge of the other square to achieve 49 sts border with rs facing size 7 needle and encore pick up and knit 120 sts along the top edge of the blanket knit 7 row bind off all sts on next row except leaving last st on the needle **do not cut yarn instead turn work and with rs facing pick up and knit 3 sts along the edge of the border plus 120
